description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8g4rd","text":"This protocol describes how to clone your chosen sgRNA sequence into the lentiCRISPRv2 plasmid. A method to validate your cloning is also included here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6j2mf","text":"Design and order sgRNA sequence oligonucleotides based on your previously identified target sequences.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f07pe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8bp2","text":"Oligo 1: 5'-CACCGNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56l1r","text":"Oligo 2: 3'-          CNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNCAAA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d41om","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f853g","text":"Important Note: Do not include the NGG PAM in your designed oligonucleotides","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dv5cf","text":"Digest 2 µg of lentiCRISPRv2 plasmid with BsmBI overnight at 55°C:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6g93","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ff7","text":"Set up the following reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n4af","text":"    2.5 µl 10X NEB r3.1 Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ufbe","text":"    x µl ddH2O to make up 25 µl final volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae6e4","text":"    1 µl BsmBI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9fn9","text":"    2 µg lentiCRISPRv2 plasmid*","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61ssc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40ags","text":"    *Add the plasmid last, into the reaction mixture, pipette gently to mix and spin briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nqeu","text":"Use the Zymoclean Gel DNA Recovery kit to gel purify the digested plasmid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78hhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h5l0","text":"A ~2 kb filler piece should be present on the gel. Only purify the larger band. Leave the ~2 kb band.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ct9h","text":"Suspend the oligonucleotides at 100 µM in autoclaved ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":56,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckh41","text":"Set up annealing reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"de9v2","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f83gk","text":"    2 µl Oligo 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejp1u","text":"    2 µL Oligo 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tpi1","text":"    2 µl 10X T4 Ligation Buffer (NEB)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sufl","text":"    14 µl ddH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dctua","text":"Anneal the oligonucleotides in a thermocycler:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r9nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73v6q","text":"    95°C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t169","text":"    Ramp temperature down to 25°C at 5°C/min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hmlh","text":"Dilute annealed oligonucleotides 1:200 with autoclaved ddH2O (1 µl annealed oligo pair + 199 µl water).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":58,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2j2so","text":"Set up the ligation reaction and incubate at 16°C overnight (with the 2X Instant Stick End Master Mix, you may be able to significantly shorten this incubation).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4l2c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8579a","text":"    x µl digested plasmid (50 ng)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcjo5","text":"    1 µl diluted oligonucleotide duplex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t5pj","text":"    6 µl 2X Instant Sticky End Master Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s6s4","text":"    x µl ddH2O to make a final volume of 12 µl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mbi8","text":"Add up to 5 µl of your ligation reaction into NEB STBL Mix \u0026 Go component cells following the Mix \u0026 Go Competent Cell protocol. Plate your cells on Amp/Carb plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Use Colony PCR to screen for the presence of cloned oligo pairs
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"93pr8","text":"Use the Colony PCR protocol to screen for the presence of cloned oligo pairs using the 2X TaqDog Master Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"116ip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhtap","text":"Run 10-20 µl of your PCR products on a 0.8% agarose gel. Use the 100 bp ladder for your gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8aoif","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cb121","text":"Primers (provided):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cf73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nhr1","text":"    lentiCRISPRv2 For: GTGGAAAGGACGAAACACCG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6omp","text":"    lentiCRISPRv2 Rev: CTAGGCACCGGATCAATTGC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k7sv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfo1j","text":"Expected amplicon for positive clones = 248 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5v6m2","text":"Prepare overnight cultures for positive clones.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5040a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj4c2","text":"Purify plasmid from overnight cultures using the Zymo Plasmid Miniprep-Classic protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: CHEM 584--Cloning sgRNA Sequences into lentiCRISPRv2
